issue.title: [C++] Test mixed quoting and escaping in CSV chunker test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14132](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14132). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some code paths are not fully exercised in CSV chunker tests.
E.g., escaping in a quoted field, quoting==false && escaping==true.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14132?focusedCommentId=17420811) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11236
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11236>
